name: Rawlson
content:
Rawlson was a Togruta female with orange skin and red-striped montrals. At some point between 22 and 19 BBY, Rawlson attended Tomarian's Annual Festival of Light Gala at Tomarian's theater on the planet Naboo with the Twi'lek Wellsley. While attending the gala, Rawlson wore maroon clothing with a gold chest plate. Upon arrival, she was greeted by the gala's host, Tomarian.
Rawlson appeared in "The Incident, Part 1," a comic story by Katie Cook with illustrations by Cara McGee and Brittany Peer. The story was published by IDW Publishing in the fifth issue of the 2020 comic series Star Wars Adventures on June 23, 2021.
